name: Graviton Theory
miscellaneous: Units with drop pods may make orbital insertions.

quote.text: This unusual specimen is not so much a classic particle as a connector -- a kind of string attaching two particles. As distance increases the connective power becomes attenuated, but if it is cut the power vanishes: forever.
quote.work: For I Have Tasted the Fruit

description: Quantum Machinery (B12) and Mind/Machine Interface (C6) pave the way for an understanding of gravity - the weakest fundamental force in the universe, but one that acts at infinite distances. With Graviton Theory, physicists can detect and measure the long-predicted gravitons - prticle strings that 'carry' gravitational force.
